name: Course Introduction
description: An introduction to the fundamental concepts and techniques of HTML.

lessons.name: Introduction to the course
lessons.description: An overview of syllabus and agenda.

lessons.name: Learn what is Web Development
lessons.description: Starting with the very basics.

lessons.name: Creating a development environment
lessons.description: Setting up the environment for React.

name: Formatting User Interfaces with HTML
description: Deep dive into HTML basics with hands-on experience.

lessons.name: Learn how to create user interfaces with HTML
lessons.description: Explore HTML Concepts

lessons.name: Working on Assignment 1
lessons.description: Start with implementation of Assignment 1.

lessons.name: Deploy the assignment to Netlify
lessons.description: Deploy the html pages on Netlify

name: Styling User Interfaces with CSS
description: Deep dive into CSS basics with hands-on experience.

lessons.name: Introduction to CSS
lessons.description: Understanding the basic concepts of CSS.

lessons.name: Selectors by tag ID, classes, and document structure
lessons.description: Learning how to style through selectors.

lessons.name: Styling color and background color
lessons.description: Learning how to use css to play with colors.

name: Database Systems
description: An introduction to the basic concepts and technologies used in databases.

lessons.name: Overview / Database Systems
lessons.description: Overview of various database systems..

lessons.name: Need For Databases
lessons.description: Understanding the need for databases.

lessons.name: Navigating File System in R
lessons.description: Exploring R to navigate through file system.

name: Data Modelling
description: An introduction to the basic concepts and technologies used in data modelling.

lessons.name: Conceptual Domain Modelling
lessons.description: Learning about UML class diagrams.

lessons.name: Logical Relational Modelling
lessons.description: Learning about ER diagrams.

lessons.name: Demonstration
lessons.description: Demonstrating UML and ERD in Lucidchart.

lessons.name: Relational Database Designing Concepts
lessons.description: Basic concepts of Relational Databases.

lessons.name: Patterns for Mapping Conceptual Modelling to Relational Schema
lessons.description: Learn how to map conceptual to relational models.

lessons.name: Worked Example
lessons.description: Examples of database designs- Taxi, Driver and Ride

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Introduction to the fundamental concepts of algorithms.

lessons.name: Introduction
lessons.description: Overview of different topics covered in the course.

lessons.name: Basic Data Structures
lessons.description: Introduction to fundamental data structures such as stacks, queues.

lessons.name: Algorithm Design Basics
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of algorithm design and analysis.

name: Sorting Techniques
description: Exploration of various sorting techniques and their complexity analysis.

lessons.name: Divide and Conquer
lessons.description: Learn about Divide and Conquer technique, on which the sorting algorithms are based.

lessons.name: Merge Sort
lessons.description: Analysis of Merge Sort.

lessons.name: Quick Sort
lessons.description: Analysis of Quick Sort.

name: Analyzing Complexities.
description: Learn how to calculate complexities for a given problem.

lessons.name: Iteration Method
lessons.description: Learn how the iterative method can be used to calculate the complexity.

lessons.name: Substitution Method
lessons.description: Learn how the substitution method can be used to calculate the complexity.

lessons.name: Recursion Trees
lessons.description: Learn how recursion trees can be used to calculate the complexity.

lessons.name: Master Method
lessons.description: Learn how master method can be used to calculate the complexity.
